
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52687234">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 happynews001 于 2025-3-22 14:57 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_QiFbz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2.baidu.com/it/u=2543006769,2283104668&amp;fm=253&amp;fmt=auto&amp;app=138&amp;f=JPEG?w=800&amp;h=1062" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2.baidu.com/it/u=2543006769,2283104668&amp;fm=253&amp;fmt=auto&amp;app=138&amp;f=JPEG?w=800&amp;h=1062"><img id="aimg_v9xEv" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://www.itxbzxw.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/935364f8dbd6e1b25cdf092ebc81132d.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://www.itxbzxw.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/935364f8dbd6e1b25cdf092ebc81132d.jpg"><br>
<br>
<br>
<font color="#111111"><font style="background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;">李仁松的《古妆汉服仙服零基础美妆教学课》是一套针对古风妆容的系统教程，专为零基础学员设计。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#111111"><font style="background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;">课程从基础化妆工具和产品选择讲起，详细讲解古妆造型的步骤，包括眉形勾勒、腮红晕染、唇妆打造等技巧。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#111111"><font style="background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;">结合汉服和仙服的妆容特点，提供多种风格的妆容示范，帮助学员快速掌握古风美妆要点，适合对古风妆容感兴趣的初学者和化妆爱好者。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font color="#111111"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font color="#333333"><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">├──001-课程简介-先导片.mp4 28.45M</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#333333"><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">├──002-（必学）1-化妆美学.mp4 119.71M</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#333333"><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">├──003-2-化妆工具(上).mp4 291.37M</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#333333"><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">├──004-2-化妆工具(下).mp4 210.09M</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#333333"><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">├──005-3-精简护肤-（倩倩老师）.mp4 29.52M</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#333333"><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">├──006-4-底妆解析-（倩倩老师）.mp4 336.82M</font></font></font><br>
